summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nirbani Dairy Management System. Backend APIs working excellently (95.2% success rate). Frontend UI loads perfectly with bilingual support, but has critical modal overlay issue preventing navigation after modal interactions.

minor_bugs.issue: API expects query parameters instead of JSON body for POST request
minor_bugs.impact: Rate calculation function not working in frontend

critical_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepts pointer events, blocking navigation clicks after modal interactions
critical_bugs.impact: Cannot navigate between pages after opening any modal (Add Farmer, Add Collection, etc.)

ui_bugs.issue: Registration form stays on login page after successful submission
ui_bugs.impact: User has to manually switch to login tab after registration

ui_bugs.issue: Farmer dropdown search not finding existing farmers
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot easily select farmers for milk collection entry

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix modal overlay issue - DialogOverlay component is intercepting pointer events and preventing navigation after modal interactions. This blocks users from navigating between pages after using Add Farmer, Add Collection, or other modal dialogs. Also fix farmer search in collection modal to display existing farmers.
